thread.title: Estill, SC Joins Sparta Commercial’s Municipal Lease Program
thread.title_full: Estill, SC Joins Sparta Commercial’s Municipal Lease Program

title: Estill, SC Joins Sparta Commercial’s Municipal Lease Program
text:
Estill, SC Joins Sparta Commercial’s Municipal Lease Program October 12, 2015, 06:00 AM Related: Municipal Leasing , Sparta Commercial Services 
Sparta Commercial Services announced that Estill, SC, with a transaction to acquire new Dodge Charger police vehicles to replace older models for its police department, is now the nineteenth and most recent jurisdiction in the Carolinas to choose Sparta's Municipal Lease Program to meet its essential equipment needs. The Sparta Program's popularity among cities and towns around the country reflects both outstanding word-of-mouth between government officials, and a growing recognition among decision makers regarding the economic advantages of leasing over having to pay for costly equipment entirely up front through full cash outlays. By selecting the Sparta Municipal Lease Program for its major equipment needs, the costs can be spread over time and thereby give more flexibility to a municipality's budgeting considerations. Today's Other News
